name: CasterGrounds
description:
Welcome to CasterGrounds!

In the world of magic, there is nothing more valuable than mana crystals.

Take on the role of a powerful spellcaster to challenge dungeons and defeat bosses to obtain valuable mana crystals.

(Competitive 2D Platformer, focused on mobility and combat)

*Created in Godot*

Feel free to checkout the source code and assets here!

Github: https://github.com/yourguyphil/CasterGrounds

***Game Version: ALPHA 1.3***

Changelog:

- The Magician now has a shield ability, press esc in practice mode/story mode to see more details!
- Upgraded the Magician's run animation
- Enemy Slimes now randomly jump (will be hectic!)
- Player hit animation is tweaked
- Various bug fixes

OPEN BUGS:
- Slimes/the player can get stuck on a tile/on an object on each other
- The Magician does not complete it's attack animation sometimes 
- Weird audio bug in HTML5 where story mode will stutter in the beginner
- HTML5 game will play music before the game fully loads

Long Term Goals:
Local Co-op and Couch party PVP
More playable characters
Storyline

Discord to report bugs/ get latest news + devlogs/ brainstorm new features: https://discord.gg/Gaf7msmr3M
